lead_paragraph: The last time Alan Webb ran a race was Sept. 29, when he won the Fifth Avenue Mile in 3 minutes 52.7 seconds. On Saturday, only yards away from that course, he will run in the United States 8-kilometer championship in Central Park.The 50 men in the race include Jorge Torres, James Carney and Fasil Bizuneh. Among the 30 women in an accompanying invitational race are Shalane Flanagan, Carrie Tollefson and Katie McGregor.
